1.0.name: wordpress/new-twitter-widget
1.0.description:
This plugin displays the latest posts from a Twitter account in a sidebar widget.

Features / Highlights

  • Widget title
  • Number of tweets to show
  • Show/Hide tweet date
  • Uses cache

No need to create Twitter Application and enter keys - uses Twitter RSS service!

Supported languages

  • English
  • Polish

If You translated plugin to Your native language, please send it to me, and will attach it to next release. E-mail address You will find on contact page.
